flawed_nl_solution:
There are currently 9*22=<<9*22=198>>198 episodes out
The new season will have 22+4=<<22+4=62>>62 episodes
So the total number of episodes is 198+62=<<198+62=260>>260 episodes
So it will take 260*0.5=<<260*0.5=130>>130 hours to watch them all
#### 130

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 62. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
